last_episode_to_air.name: Fortunate
last_episode_to_air.overview: The crew arrives somewhere that seems too good to be true, and it just might be.

name: The Ark
overview: 100 years in the future, planetary colonization missions have begun as a necessity to help secure the survival of the human race. The first of these missions on a spacecraft known as Ark One encounters a catastrophic event causing massive destruction and loss of life. With more than a year left to go before reaching their target planet, a lack of life-sustaining supplies and loss of leadership, the remaining crew must become the best versions of themselves to stay on course and survive.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season two, after the brave crew of Ark One reaches their destination and finds it uninhabitable, they must survive long enough to locate a new home for themselves and all the ships that follow.

tagline: The end of one world. The beginning of the next.

episodes.name: Everyone Wanted to Be on This Ship
episodes.overview: After suffering a disaster, the remaining crew of spaceship Ark One must band together to survive.

episodes.name: Like It Touched the Sun
episodes.overview: The crew struggles to establish a sense of order on the ship. Two investigations uncover more questions than answers.

episodes.name: Get Out and Push
episodes.overview: All hope seems lost when the crew learns an asteroid is hours away from impact.

episodes.name: We Weren't Supposed to Be Awake
episodes.overview: When their psyches are put to the test by hallucinations, the crew must race to find the cause.

episodes.name: One Step Forward, Two Steps Back
episodes.overview: Sacrifices must be made when a radiation leak sparks crisis.

episodes.name: Two By Two
episodes.overview: The crew must devise a plan after identifying a planet rich in much-needed fuel.

episodes.name: A Slow Death Is Worse
episodes.overview: The crew discover they're not alone in space and learn more about where they came from.

episodes.name: Every Single Person Matters
episodes.overview: A new polarizing figure enters the equation as the crew suffers technical difficulties.

episodes.name: The Painful Way
episodes.overview: After an unpopular decision, discord gives way to deadly mutiny in which loyalties are tested.

episodes.name: Hoping for Forever
episodes.overview: The situation onboard Ark One seems hopeless after crew members are taken hostage.

episodes.name: The Last Thing You Ever Do
episodes.overview: The crew must understand their enemy better as they attempt a dangerous rescue mission.

episodes.name: Everybody Wins
episodes.overview: Ark One tries to broker peace with its adversary but doesn't realize it could cost everything.

episodes.name: Failed Experiment
episodes.overview: The crew must decide the best way forward with or without help from their nemesis, Evelyn Maddox.

episodes.name: Kill or Be Killed
episodes.overview: The arrival of new crew members presents questions of who can be trusted and what to do with them.

episodes.name: Anomaly
episodes.overview: An unexpected visitor wreaks havoc on the ship's electrical system.

episodes.name: The Other You
episodes.overview: When two realities intertwine, two theories on what could and shouldn't have been are revealed.

episodes.name: Museum of Death
episodes.overview: A disturbing rescue mission raises questions about Eva's past.

episodes.name: Pretty Big Deal
episodes.overview: When a distress call leads to a desolate planet, what the crew finds turns everything on its head.

episodes.name: It Can't Be True
episodes.overview: After an attempted murder, the crew work together to find who's responsible before it's too late.

episodes.name: We Don't Kill Our Own
episodes.overview: The ship is taken under siege and the crew must outsmart the mutineers to save themselves.

episodes.name: Cycle of Violence
episodes.overview: Garnet has her work cut out for her when she attempts diplomacy with a longstanding enemy.

episodes.name: It Should Have Been You
episodes.overview: Garnet and Ian are trapped in the empty ship where they may remain for the rest of their lives.

episodes.name: It Will Be Over Soon
episodes.overview: Strickland is presented with an impossible choice.

episodes.name: Fortunate
episodes.overview: The crew arrives somewhere that seems too good to be true, and it just might be.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In season two, after the brave crew of Ark One reaches their destination and finds it uninhabitable, they must survive long enough to locate a new home for themselves and all the ships that follow.
